javadoc:
Implementation for a ProjectManager; creates, opens,
 and deletes Projects. It also keeps track of recently opened projects.

methods.javadoc:
Get list of project locations that user most recently opened.
@return list of project locations
methods.name: getRecentProjects
methods.comment: Get list of project locations that user most recently opened.

methods.name: getLastOpenedProject

return.comment:
project last opened by the user; returns NULL if a project
 was never opened OR the last opened project is no longer valid

methods.javadoc: Update the last opened project preference.
methods.name: setLastOpenedProject
methods.comment: Update the last opened project preference.

methods.javadoc:
Delete the project in the given location and remove it from the list of known projects.
@return false if no project was deleted.
methods.name: deleteProject
methods.comment: Delete the project in the given location and remove it from the list of known projects.

return.comment: false if no project was deleted.

methods.javadoc: Keep the specified project on the list of known projects.
methods.name: rememberProject
methods.comment: Keep the specified project on the list of known projects.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the specified project exists.
methods.name: projectExists
methods.comment: Returns true if the specified project exists.

methods.name: addDefaultTools
methods.comment:
Add the default tools to the given tool chest.  This method does not attempt to merge the
 user's previous tools, as does #installTools(ToolChest).

params.name: toolChest
params.comment: tool chest which to add the default tools

name: DefaultProjectManager
comment:
Implementation for a ProjectManager; creates, opens,
 and deletes Projects. It also keeps track of recently opened projects.
